Text: Tak amaFarisi kpʼamako̩takada iche̩ka kwo Je̩rusale̩m wa jʼugbo-wñ.
Oñ ma li abu kʼamako̩che̩-wñ iche̩ka nʼo̩wo̩ elifo̩, owñ chʼo̩wo̩ ku ma ma gwe̩ n, ajʼuje̩wñ.
Todu iche̩wñ kʼamaFarisi kpai amaju chaka ma gwe̩ o̩wo̩-ma nyo̩nyo̩ n, ma jʼe̩wñ n, todu ma gwo̩nyʼe̩wñ-o̩gu abogijo;
ma kwef aja, ma ma dʼo̩la tunyʼomi n, ma jʼuje̩wñ n. E̩wñ omune̩ wewe ku ma mugba ku ma gwo̩nyu ño̩ do̩mo̩ ge̩, owñ chʼago kpai ucha kpai e̩wñ eku ebije-ekpikpa edu tunyʼomi.
Oñ amaFarisi kpai amako̩takada tʼowñ ene kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼamako̩che̩-we̩ ma le tikpa e̩wñ-o̩gu abogijo n, ku ma muda nʼo̩wo̩ elifo̩ ajʼuje̩wñ-ma?
Oñ i ka ñwu ma, kakini, Aizaya kache̩ o̩meme̩le̩ ugbo me̩, ame̩nayechi, owñ chʼalu ku ma ko̩tane̩ kakini,
Ma la diba ñwu mi ibe̩te̩ ofofo,
Me̩ tʼo̩la uko̩ e-O̩jo̩ no̩, oñ me̩ gwo̩nyʼe̩wñ-o̩gu e-amone̩.
Tak i ka ñwu ma, kakini, I nyo̩ gbe̩, me̩ hi uko̩ e-O̩jo̩ tʼiba, todu ku me̩ dejutʼe̩wñ-o̩gu e-me̩.
Todu Mose̩s kakini, Bumʼata-we̩ kpʼiye-we̩; kpai e̩ne̩ kʼi la akebi ata-wñ abe̩k iye-wñ, uku ki fʼoji-wñ kpa.
Ame̩ muda kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼone̩ aka ñw ata-wñ abe̩k iye-wñ kakini, E̩wñ-mi kʼe̩ ma jʼile ugbo-wñ che ko̩rban, owñ chʼele O̩jo̩.
Me̩ je̩ ñw u che e̩wñ du tod ata-wñ abe̩k iye-wñ ge̩ n;
oñ me̩ nʼe̩wñ-o̩gu e-me̩ ku me̩ du te̩ fʼo̩da o̩la O̩jo̩ la; i ño̩ nʼe̩wñ e̩gʼe-le̩ wewe kʼame̩ che ge̩.
Tak i ño̩ dabi fʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ do̩ wʼugbo-wñ ge̩, oñ i ka ñwu ma, kakini, O̩chaka-me̩ ki nagbʼomu-mi, ku me̩ mʼoji-wñ.
I nʼe̩wñ du ki akwʼo̩do̩da atʼef one̩ ki aneke fʼo̩la-wñ daji n; e̩wñ ki muda akwef one̩ dufu chʼe̩wñ ki adʼo̩la one̩ ji. [
Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du nʼeti ki agbo̩la, ki nagbo̩.]
Oñ e̩gba kʼi kwo bʼo̩wo̩ one̩ le̩ te̩ kʼi mugudu tef unyi amako̩che̩-wñ tʼowñ ene oji ita le̩.
Tak i ka ñwu ma kakini, Ame̩ onugo nʼibe abe̩le̩ ni ge̩? Ame̩ ma ka kʼe̩wñ du ki kwʼo̩do̩da atʼef one̩ aneke fʼo̩la-wñ daji n?
Todu i chʼef e̩do̩-wñ i atʼo̩ n, chai tʼef ukulu-wñ, tak i adufu ubioko. Oñ uje̩wñ du fe̩.
Tak i kakini, E̩wñ ki akwef one̩ dufu, e-le̩ adʼo̩la one̩ ji.
Todu akwʼejefu, kwef e̩do̩ amone̩ ibe e̩bie̩ne̩ adufu, abutabu eche, oji eji, one̩ ekpa, o̩ya one̩ etene,
ejufufu e̩wñ eche, e̩wñ bibi eche, o̩gwo̩, e̩wñ tuñ, eju bibi, echakpabie̩, eke, idada,
e̩wñ bibi-i du akwʼejefu dufu, abʼe-le̩ la adʼo̩la one̩ ji.
Tak abu kʼi kwane̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ i nyʼalo̩me̩ Taya kpai Saido̩n. Oñ i gudu tef unyiʼka, i dʼowñ e̩do̩ kʼe̩ne̩ du ki ma n; i la neke maja n.
Ama ababale̩ abu kʼonobule̩ kʼo̩ma-wñ onobule̩ kekele chenʼafu ki ma de̩hiolo n gbʼinabali-wñ, i lewa fiane̩ e̩re̩-wñ.
Onobule̩ le̩ la chʼe̩ne̩ Grik, o̩lo̩pu-wñ chʼe-Sairo̩foniki. Oñ i rodubʼo̩ kʼi ne ebili le̩ kwef o̩ma-wñ onobule̩ dufu.
I ka ñw u, kakini, Je̩ ñw efu amo̩ma ki ko̩ ejodudu ta; todu i nyo̩ ku ma kʼuje̩wñ amo̩ma rojane̩ ñw amabia n.
I la dohi ñw u, kakini, Ochochi, Ondu, ama i chaka chʼamabia ki jʼof itebulu aje̩ e̩gbanyo̩ e-abimo̩to̩.
Tak i ka ñw u, kakini, Tod o̩la kʼe̩ ka-i, e̩ lo we̩; ebili le̩ kwʼef o̩ma-we̩ onobule̩ dufu me̩.
Tak i kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼunyi-wñ, oñ i li abu ku ma dʼimo̩to̩ le̩ dachi oj ate̩, ebili la dʼef uwñ ge̩ n.
Oñ i ño̩ kwʼalo̩me̩ Taya le ge̩, I legu Saido̩n du wa ohimini Galili, i lalegu ane̩ De̩kapo̩lis du.
Taku ma dʼe̩ne̩ʼka wʼugbo-wñ kʼi chʼajeti, kʼi ño̩ akwoulo̩ ge̩; oñ ma gbo̩ko̩bʼo̩ kʼi dʼo̩wo̩-wñ nʼo.
Tak i mʼu du kwo bʼo̩wo̩ amone̩ le̩ te̩ tʼo̩wo̩ʼka, i mʼo̩wo̩-wñ ko tunyʼeti-wñ, i tito̩, i la do̩wo̩kado ukpalu-wñ;
tak i chʼeju go ojale, i nafifi, oñ i ka ñw u, kakini, E̩fata, owñ che, Mubite̩.
Tak eti-wñ mubi, iku ukpalu-wñ la mutu, oñ i kwoko̩la nyo̩nyo̩.
Tak i hi ma owu ku ma we eka ñw e̩ne̩ du; ama alu du kʼi hi uma owu, abe̩le̩ ma nyo̩gba atakoya-wñ ololo tule.
Ibe la takpa rʼuma efu chaka, ma kakini, I fʼe̩wñ du che o̩me̩me̩le̩; i aje̩ ñw amajeti onugo ku ma gbo̩la, kpai amajalu ku ma ko̩la.
